comments:
I was trying to check out JBOSS source code 
(:pserver:anonymous@cvs.jboss.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/jboss ) using Eclipse 
build 200209240928, JDK 1.4.1-b21 running Windows 2000 SP2. When I switched 
to "Modules" mode and tried to expand HEAD I did not get list of modules and 
following exception was logged into .metadata/.log

!SESSION Sep 26, 2002 24:01:20.155 ---------------------------------------------
java.version=1.4.1
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments: -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -data 
c:\temp\eclipse.workspace -install file:D:/eclipse/
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 Sep 26, 2002 24:01:20.155
!MESSAGE Unhandled exception caught in event loop.
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 Sep 26, 2002 24:01:20.171
!MESSAGE java.util.NoSuchElementException
!STACK 0
java.util.NoSuchElementException
	at java.util.StringTokenizer.nextToken(StringTokenizer.java:232)
	at

(RemoteModule.java:108)

(Checkout.java:178)

(CVSUIPlugin.java:219)

(BranchTag.java:59)
	at org.eclipse.ui.model.WorkbenchContentProvider.getChildren
(WorkbenchContentProvider.java:51)
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.AbstractTreeViewer.getRawChildren
(AbstractTreeViewer.java:571)
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.StructuredViewer.getFilteredChildren
(StructuredViewer.java:346)

	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.EventTable.sendEvent(EventTable.java:77)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.sendEvent(Widget.java:849)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Tree.wmNotifyChild(Tree.java:1764)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control.WM_NOTIFY(Control.java:3700)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite.WM_NOTIFY(Composite.java:639)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control.windowProc(Control.java:2730)

This is most likely due to an invalid entry in the CVSROOT/modules file. Since 
the server does not perform any validation on the file, we will need to improve 
our exception handling.
